name: Genbo the Dishonored
aura: Increases Ally SPD in Arena Battles by 20.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit steals any [Increase ATK] buffs. Each hit also has a 30% chance of stealing 1 random buff.

The [Increase ATK] buff steal cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Twin Soulswords

Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Damage +5%
Level 7: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 8: Damage +5%
Level 9: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of all buffs by 1 turn. This effect cannot be resisted on critical hits.
skills.name: Heartless Blitz

Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Sword Trance

skills.desc: Immune to [Decrease ATK] debuffs. Will ignore [Unkillable] buffs when attacking under an [Increase ATK] buff.
skills.name: Flinty [P]
